import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function SignUpForm() { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [controlPassword, setControlPassword] = useState('') const handleRegister = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const terms = document.getElementById('terms') const usernameError = document.querySelector() } return (

setUsername(e.target.value)} value={username} />


setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} />


setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} />


setControlPassword(e.target.value)} value={controlPassword} />


) } export default SignUpForm
